TopicTitle: Kethane mod: is there Kethane on Kerbin?

Articles.Content: I have a satellite orbiting Kerbin and I haven't found any kethane so far, is there any kethane on the planet, or do I have to go elsewhere?
I believe it has kethane, at least it had a few version back, but Mun is always my first target.

Thanks for the reply! You're right, there is. I alternated my orbit a lot and so far I've found a single kethane deposit in the ocean. Hopefully I'll find some on land so that I can land planes and pick it up.
There is Kethane on Kerbin, try putting a scanner into polar orbit and doing x50 warp, it gives you good general coverage

I noticed that on two different "save games" that on one i had Kethane due west of the launch facility all the way to the coast. On the other save, i had no Kethane. Not sure, but is it randomly generated or will it always be in the same place for each person?

TB

I noticed that on two different "save games" that on one i had Kethane due west of the launch facility all the way to the coast. On the other save, i had no Kethane. Not sure, but is it randomly generated or will it always be in the same place for each person?

Kethane deposits are procedurally generated for each save.

I found ore and Kethane on Kerbin tho not a lot of Keth. May have to develope oceanic dredgers to get at the gas

Alacrity
